"A Sudden Survey":
"I see a lot of ARKS coming back from
their daily patrols exhausted.
Celebrations are a great way to relax, so
I want to make this event one that'll wipe
their fatigue away!
When you're out there tiring yourself out,
please try to think of some things that
might soothe your aching bones!

※Target Lv. 1+ enemies"
